name: BeezelBub
description:
BeezelBub is an action exploration game about a rather devilish knitted toy called Bub. Beginning as a defenseless toy, Bub will obtain upgrades over the course of the game in-order-to overcome obstacles he couldn't before and fight the evil Husks: Spewers, Stretchers, and the final menacing Grudger.

Run, jump, shoot and slam through 3 zones of platforming in the world of Trinket Town! From the mechanical Wailing Workshop, to the ascending Maker's Mountain, and the grimy Sewer of Stitches. 

Developed as a Final Year Project on the University of Plymouth Game Arts and Design course.

Follow me!: https://twitter.com/StealthySloth56
